subject: Re: [junit] Custom MethodSorter
msgSnippet: I d like to see a random method sorter.  That would give better confidence that your tests *are* independent.  Is it worth raising a ticket for this? ...
messageBody:
I'd like to see a random method sorter. That would give better confidence
that your tests *are* independent. Is it worth raising a ticket for this?

On 5 December 2012 17:14, Kevin Cooney <kcooney@...> wrote:

> Question: why do you want your own method sorter? As Matthew mentioned in
> his StackOverflow response, it's best to make test methods not dependent on
> each other
>
> -- Kevin
>
> On Wed, Dec 5, 2012 at 4:27 AM, Eirik Lygre <eirik.lygre@...> wrote:
>
> > **
> >
> >
> > I'm looking at creating my own MethodSorter. Is there documentation on
> how
> > to do that, and is it even possible?
> >
> > --
> > Eirik
> >
> > There is no high like a tango high
> > There is no low like a tango low
> >
> > [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
> >
> >
> >
>

> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
